projects.title: Internal Efficiency System
projects.label: Project A
projects.subtitle: I recognized a bottleneck in our daily operations and didn't wait for permission to fix it.
projects.description: I architected and deployed a custom check-in system that streamlined attendance and logistics tracking. Built with modern web technologies, this tool proves I can diagnose a business pain point and prescribe a code-based cure.

projects.title: Skeley: Automated Storytelling
projects.label: Project B
projects.subtitle: In the age of AI, creativity is about curation and consistency.
projects.description: This project utilizes generative AI tools to build a cohesive brand identity for a skeleton character named "Skeley". It demonstrates my ability to control AI outputs, maintain visual consistency across media, and tell compelling storiesâ€”skills I now apply to modern web design.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.label: Project C
projects.subtitle: Building seamless shopping experiences with modern web technologies.
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce solution with real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and an intuitive admin dashboard. Built with React, Node.js, and Firebase for scalable performance.

projects.title: Travel Planning App
projects.label: Project D
projects.subtitle: Transforming travel chaos into organized adventures.
projects.description: An interactive travel planning application featuring horizontal scroll itineraries, real-time collaboration, and beautiful photo integration. Designed with the traveler's journey in mind.

projects.title: Dashboard Analytics
projects.label: Project E
projects.subtitle: Data visualization that tells a story.
projects.description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard with real-time data visualization, customizable charts, and automated reporting. Empowers businesses to make data-driven decisions with clarity and confidence.
